settings.title: Settings
settings.languageDescription: Choose your preferred language for the interface.
settings.resetDescription: Clear all saved game data and history.
settings.confirmReset: Are you sure? This will permanently delete all game data and generate a new device ID. This cannot be undone.

instructions.helpPrompt: Not sure how this works? Click the ? button.

instructionsModal.title: How to Play
instructionsModal.description: Guess the 5-color combo in 6 tries. The colors in the combination can repeat.
instructionsModal.feedbackTitle: After each guess, you'll get feedback on each color:
instructionsModal.correct: If the full color is shown, the guess was correct.
instructionsModal.present: If half of the color is shown, it is present but in the wrong position.
instructionsModal.absent: If it is fully greyed out, then it is not present in the combo.
instructionsModal.selectColors: Use the color buttons below the board to select colors for your guess.

winModal.solved: You solved the puzzle in {attempts} attempts!
